data.partBlankContent: We were driving down a lonely section of highway in the Arizona desert, late at night. We h__ been dri____ for ho___, a__ at th__ point, we norm____ would ha__ stopped t_ find so__ hotel t_ sleep i_. But th__ night, we dec____ to ca__ under t__ stars. data.fullContent: We were driving down a lonely section of highway in the Arizona desert, late at night. We had been driving for hours, and at that point, we normally would have stopped to find some hotel to sleep in. But that night, we decided to camp under the stars. We were rewarded with a brilliant display of stars - far from the lights of the city, we could see thousands of them.
data.answer: 夜深人静的时候，我们开车行驶在亚利桑那州沙漠的一段公路上。我们已经开了好几个小时的车，在那个时候，我们通常会停下来找个旅馆睡一觉。但那天晚上，我们决定在星空下露营。在远离城市灯光的地方，我们可以看到成千上万的星星。
